prompt: make me website where i can track my calories and workout which i performed in gym
refinedPrompt: Create a comprehensive fitness tracking website that allows users to log their daily calorie intake, track their gym workouts, and monitor their progress over time. The website should include features such as a food database for easy calorie tracking, a workout library with exercise descriptions and videos, and personalized reports and charts to visualize progress. Additionally, incorporate goal-setting functionality and the ability to connect with other users for motivation and accountability.
